name: Lulu's journey
description:
Lulu has watched all her friends set to the sky towards the balloon land. She now dreams of going there herself. Can you help lulu on her journey to balloon land past the mischievous Blockies and Tris in her way.

start screen with clouds and lulu

The jam theme was cute and colorful, Team Nineteen decided to make a simple yet addictive game with pretty sky colors and a super cute protagonist.

Shield activated
Night sky preview

Credits:
Background music: Mark Sparling http://marksparling.com/
